EmailTemplate.name: Internal audit 4-15-14
EmailTemplate.subject: is internal audit misaligned?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Stakeholders and CAEs have different ideas about the role of internal audit and expected goals. What are the anomalies? Do they exist in your program?
Find out in Tammy Whitehouse's latest article detailing those misaligned perceptions.
Think you might be missing additional deep-dive coverage? Email Angela to begin your subscription for $799*. Or call (888) 519-9200
Need help? Email us | Call us 888-519-9200 | Visit
*Offer is for a single-user subscription and available to first-time subscribers only through April 30, 2014.
